title: Resume Creator
description: Resume Creator is a tool for creating resumes using a custom design system.
statements: Created a mobile-first responsive design system using TailwindCSS and Storybook.

title: Dota Drafter
description: Dota Drafter is a tool for assessing strengths and weaknesses between characters.
statements: Designed database for admins to create, read, update, and delete hero pairings using Supabase.

title: marktoh.com
description: A photography e-commerce website showcasing several photographs from a photographer.
statements: Integrated checkout using Stripe's Checkout API and created auxiliary endpoints in Node.js to process checkout session.
